# TEQS Projects

## TEQS Core
A robust data ingestion and HPC orchestration engine for 
spatiotemporal datasets, supporting multi-cloud and on-premises clusters.

## TEQS Analytics
Suite of AI modules, including transformer-based pipelines, 
graph neural networks (GNNs), time-series analysis, and multi-modal 
sensor fusion for large-scale environmental monitoring.

## TEQS Visualization
Interactive 3D terrain rendering, AR/VR overlays, and NeRF-based (Neural Radiance Fields) 
integration for immersive environment reconstructions.

## Additional Repositories
- **TEQS-IoT** for edge-based data collection  
- **TEQS-Cloud** for serverless HPC pipelines, etc.
